system.description:
Effect: All allies on the Field are healed 8 Ticks of HP, and 2 Ticks of PP.

The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.

Requirement: User is a Dynamaxed Alcremie and has a Fairy-Type attack on their Active List.

actions.name: G-Max Finale
